ape thaththa apa thidenage anagathaya saru kirimata mahath wu duk kandarawak windeya.masuru kamak lobha kamak kisiwiteka nothibunu ape thaththa apa illu sama deyakma salasa dunne apata kisidu aakarayaka dukak apahasuthawak athi nowana aakarayataya.sharira shakthiyen wadi ayaku nowuwath thaththage manasika ha aathma shakthiya puduma sahagatha lesa ihala thaththwayaka wiya.ma sarasawiye dewana wasare sitina wita warak thaththa darunu lesa asanipa wiya.muthra pitawimata muthra batayak sawi kara thibiyadi pawa eya pitathata nopenenase kakula wate bada nawatha jyothisha wada kirima sidu kale mage adhyapana katayuthu awasan wi nothibuna nisaya.
